definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Mix cucumber juice with milk and use it instead of a cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 將黃瓜汁與牛奶調和成潔面乳。

sentences.english: I love this cleanser it take makeup off without drying my skin out.
sentences.chinese: 我喜愛這個潔面乳，去除妝面也不讓皮膚乾燥。

sentences.english: Foaming cleansers are gentle enough for your skin .
sentences.chinese: 泡沫潔面乳很溫和，適合您的皮膚。

sentences.english: Or , apply Cleansing Milk onto face, massage gently to clean the face and neck, rinse off.
sentences.chinese: 或用潔面乳輕輕按摩清潔面部與頸部，沖洗乾淨。

sentences.english: You need to find a good cleanser that your skin responds well to, and stick with it.
sentences.chinese: 你需要找到你皮膚喜歡的好的潔面乳，並堅持使用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Yirou beautiful white clean face emulsion has the efficacy of …
sentences.chinese: 結論伊柔美白潔面乳具有清潔皮膚作用。

sentences.english: Cleanse skin with clear water or cleanser in the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，用水或潔面乳洗淨即可。

sentences.english: What type of cleanser should I use?
sentences.chinese: 我該使用什麼類型的潔面乳呢？

sentences.english: Apply onto face, massage gently to clean the face and neck, rinse off .
sentences.chinese: 用潔面乳輕輕按摩清潔面部與頸部，沖洗乾淨。

sentences.english: I have been using this for years and am STILL happy with it.
sentences.chinese: 我用這款潔面乳已經多年，我還是非常喜歡它。

sentences.english: This face wash doesn't lather but still cleans pretty well.
sentences.chinese: 這款潔面乳沒有泡沫，但是仍然清洗的很乾淨。

sentences.english: This rich, aromatic cleansing milk, helps restore the youthful bloom to dehydrated and mature skin.
sentences.chinese: 此含玫瑰香味的潔面乳有助缺水及成熟肌膚重拾青春。

sentences.english: This is a wonderful cleansing creme and does not dry out my skin.
sentences.chinese: 非常棒的潔面乳，滋潤，皮膚不會幹哦。

sentences.english: Then take the milk wash the gel foam is also cool, Yes.
sentences.chinese: 然後拿潔面乳洗臉，是凝露狀泡沫的還涼涼的，不錯。

sentences.english: Your complexion is on the oily side. I suggest you use cleansing gel.
sentences.chinese: 你的皮膚較油，我提議你用潔面乳。

definition: Hazeline, Unilever range of skin care products
Nivea, skin and body care brand
